meta_title: Outage Meaning: Industrial Definition & Operational Impact
meta_description: An outage is a period of system or equipment unavailability. Understand the difference between planned and unplanned outages and their impact on industrial OEE.
title: What is an Outage? Definition and Industrial Context

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is an Outage? Definition and Industrial Context

image_prompt: A high-angle, professional photo of a large industrial turbine or generator being serviced by a team of three diverse technicians wearing high-visibility vests, hard hats, and safety glasses. One technician is holding a rugged industrial tablet showing diagnostic charts. The setting is a clean, modern, well-lit power plant or large-scale manufacturing facility. The focus is on the scale of the machinery and the precision of the maintenance work. Photo-realistic, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting.
